definitions.definition: relating to love or a close loving relationship:
exciting and mysterious and having a strong effect on your emotions:
examples: We thought that Egypt was an incredibly romantic country.

definitions.definition: not practical and having a lot of ideas that are not related to real life:
examples: She has a romantic idea of what it's like to be a struggling young artist.

definitions.definition: someone who is not practical and has ideas that are not related to real life:
